title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 201.2 - Nondisclosure of income information and total annual income information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 201.2 - Nondisclosure of income information and total annual income information

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 171-b(5)

No provisions of the Freedom of Information Law or

Chapter V of this Title shall apply to the verification of income information
and to the determination of total annual income, or any material
representations that any requester or any officer or employee thereof, forwards
to the department pursuant to the provisions of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
201.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
